special_text:
[i](At the beginning of your upkeep, if you weren’t dealt combat damage since your last turn, put a brick counter on this Outpost.)[/i]
When this outpost enters, create two 2/2 green Wolf creature tokens.
 2+ Bricks
Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana of any type that land produced.
 4+ Bricks
{5}: Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token. Activate only as a sorcery.
